name: Apple
description: Fresh red apples packed with natural sweetness and fiber.

name: Banana
description: Ripe yellow bananas — rich in potassium and energy.

name: Orange
description: Juicy oranges full of vitamin C and refreshing citrus flavor.

name: Mango
description: Golden mangoes that are smooth, sweet, and tropical.

name: Strawberry
description: Bright red strawberries — juicy and perfect for desserts.

name: Pineapple
description: Tropical pineapple with tangy-sweet flavor and rich aroma.

name: Watermelon
description: Cool and juicy watermelon, perfect for summer refreshment.

name: Grapes
description: Seedless green grapes bursting with natural sweetness.

name: Kiwi
description: Tangy green kiwi fruit rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.

name: Papaya
description: Soft and sweet papaya filled with nutrients and tropical taste.
